verbose_text: APS can significantly increase the levels of E 2, ALP and BGP in the serum of rats, suggesting that APS has an estrogen like effect and can prevent the formation of osteoporosis after ovariectomy by lowering the ALP and BGP values in the serum.
evidence: BGP in the serum of rats, suggesting that APS has an estrogen-like effect and can prevent the formation of osteoporosis after ovariectomy by lowering the ALP and BGP
